SEARCH
Module eus.ehu.txipironesmastodonfx
Package eus.ehu.txipironesmastodonfx.data_access

Class APIAccessManager

java.lang.Object
eus.ehu.txipironesmastodonfx.data_access.APIAccessManager
public class APIAccessManager extends Object
This class is responsible for managing access to the API. It will be used to get the data from the API and convert it. It will also be used to verify tokens. This is the only class that needs access to the internet.
Author:
Nicolás Aguado, Haizea Bermejo, Xiomara Cáceces, Marcos Chouciño

  • Method Details

    • verifyAndGetId

      public static String verifyAndGetId(String token)
      Method to verify if a token is valid. It will return the id of the account if the account is valid and null if it is not.
      Parameters:
      token - (String) - token to verify
      Returns:
      (String) - id of the account if the token is valid, null if it is not

    • getTootId

      public static List<Toot> getTootId(String selectedAccId, String token) throws IOException
      Method to get the statuses (activity toots) of an account. It will return a list of toots. If the request can't be made, it will return null.
      Parameters:
      selectedAccId - (String) - id of the account
      token - (String) - system variable of the account
      Returns:
      (List invalid input: '<' Toot >) - list of toots
      Throws:
      IOException - - When the request can't be made

    • getFollow

      public static List<Follow> getFollow(String selectedAccId, String token, boolean following)
      Generic method to get the follow list of an account The parameter following indicates if we want to get the following list or the followers list.
      Parameters:
      selectedAccId - (String) - id of the account
      token - (String) - token of the account
      following - (boolean) - true if we want the following list, false if we want the followers list
      Returns:
      (List invalid input: '<' Follow >) - list of follows

    • getAccount

      public static Account getAccount(String id, String token)
      Generic method to get an account from its id
      Parameters:
      id - (String) - id of the account
      token - (String) - token of the account
      Returns:
      (Account) - the account

    • performSearch

      public static SearchResult performSearch(String query, String token, int limit)
      Method to perform a search on the mastodon servers. It will return a SearchResult object with the results.
      Parameters:
      query - (String) - query to search
      token - (String) - token of the account
      limit - (int) - limit of results for each category in searchresult
      Returns:
      (SearchResult) - object with the results

    • postToot

      public static String postToot(String aut, TootToBePosted toot)
      Method to post a toot, NOT FINISHED
      Parameters:
      aut - (String) - Mastodon account token
      toot - (TootToBePosted) - The toot already insanced that will
      Returns:
      (String) - The response of the request - Usually formatted as json

    • getLikedToots

      public static List<Toot> getLikedToots(String token) throws IOException
      Method to get the toots liked by a user It will return a list of toots. If the request can't be made, it will return null.
      Parameters:
      token - (String) - token of the account
      Returns:
      (List) - the list of liked toots
      Throws:
      IOException - - if the request can't be made

      Parameters:

      Returns:
